name: It Crumbles
description:
You are a robot FILLED with bombs, and you're trying to climb a very fragile tower. Use your bombs sparingly, as damage to the tower will only make it harder to climb. Don't worry though, you can also BOMB JUMP over pits and walls with enough skill.

I had more ideas that I wanted to include, but the weekend wasn't enough time to do everything. The biggest thing that is lacking is upgrades.

Apologies for the lacking description, I'll update it over the next few days!
